This guy can combine with [Frogtosser Banneret](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Frogtosser Banneret), [Oona's Blackguard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oona's Blackguard), and [Cloak and Dagger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cloak and Dagger) now. posts.post_content:
The only issue I have with the card is the artwork:
  
   
There is no way this artwork would show a pretty young woman (the type that make up 99% of female figures in fantasy art/games) getting smacked in the face. No, it has to be a pantomime dame.
  
   
That's pretty much \*\*\* when you think about it.
